modName: FR and ENG - Keys Shields of Setvi - Tribute - Skyrim
summary:
This mod add two standalones Keys Shields, with two Crossed Keys symbols.
This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.

For the stats, please look at the pictures.
Craft: at forge under steel section.

Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
Sorry for the ugly Keys symbols.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=5]This mod add two standalones Keys Shields, with two Crossed Keys symbols.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.

[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]For the stats, please look at the pictures.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Craft: at forge under steel section.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Sorry for the ugly Keys symbols.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]No DLC or no other mods are required.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]I used the modders ressource I've found here:
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916/?]A Steel Heater Shield by Abakus
[/url][/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]I'm not sure but this mod - maybe - doesn't work with any other mod who use the HeaterShield.esp or .dds textures - not tested atm.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Since I start in a new job, I've no time to mod/update/play at Skyrim.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]A Happy New Year to all of you. Un très bon Nouvel An à chacun de vous.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]No copyright infringement intended.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]The Keys Symbols are the logos of Hundredth (the American band) and of Woodkid (the French artist).
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Sorry for my bad English.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Cuz tomorrow is my 27th birthday, and cuz music is my passion, I wish to pay tribute to:
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Two of my most favorites artists ever.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Much thanks & love for you:
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Both Hundredth & Woodkid.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]____________
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]Thanks, Setvi.
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]My others mods:
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2764642/?tb=mods&pUp=1]SETVI's account User Files.
[/url][/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b][b][u][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url]
[youtube]vSkb0kDacjs[/youtube]
[youtube]AuxpUqSs5MU[/youtube]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-2-1444644960.png[/img]
[color=#d8d8d8][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72359-0-1451657950.jpg[/img][/color]
[color=#d8d8d8][img]http://www.altpress.com/images/uploads/feature_header_images/hundredth_2015.jpg[/img][/color]
[color=#d8d8d8][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-0-1451654101.jpg[/img][/color]
[color=#444444][img]<- Me *
[/color][/size][/u][/b][b][u][color=#444444][size=5]* (With the black More Than Life sweat).[/size][/color][/u][/b][/center]
